name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Steven SZAREWICZ, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Steven SZAREWICZ, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 22nd day of January, 1997 the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted limited to the issue of whether a formal inquest is necessary before a coroner may act as an issuing authority.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
688 A.2d 167
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Steven SZAREWICZ, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 22, 1997.
